definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
to retail/to sell individually or in small quantities

sentences.english: The one hundred and first meridian was passed.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经越过了经线一百零一度了。

sentences.english: As you can see, as long as the initial value is above zero, this function will terminate.
sentences.chinese: 可见，只要初始值大于零，这个函数就能够终止。

sentences.english: S is a nil-extension of strong semilattice of right semigroup.
sentences.chinese: 为右群强半格的诣零理想扩张。

sentences.english: Zero stock is the best way for inventory control.
sentences.chinese: 零库存是库存管理最好的发展方向。

sentences.english: C. back one year, put the year zero in the gap, and declare the disagreement solved.
sentences.chinese: 支持一年，投入年调零空白，并且宣称解决的分歧。

sentences.english: Such a theoretical device would have a zero ohm output impedance in series with the source.
sentences.chinese: 这种理论的设备将有一个与源系列零欧姆的输出阻抗。

sentences.english: The bending stress is zero for the element at B.
sentences.chinese: 在B处的单元体，弯曲应力为零。

sentences.english: The closer a society's population growth rate gets to zero, the more population aging it will be.
sentences.chinese: 一个社会的人口增加率越接近零，其人口便愈老龄化。

sentences.english: We always reject zero as an eigenfunction on the ground of physics.
sentences.chinese: 根据物理上的理由，我们总是剔除把零作为本征函数。

sentences.english: The non-transactions sites are trying to replicate the unique product set without the costs.
sentences.chinese: 而非交易性网站却试图零成本复制这种独特产品体系。

sentences.english: So your heat capacity is zero.
BE what naked eye could not see, water works properly to bury to zero.
sentences.chinese: 是肉眼看不到的，水灵入土为零。

sentences.english: Would you pay $1.4 million for a bowl of strawberries?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意为一个草莓碗一百四十点零万美元？

sentences.english: And, wherever it's defined, it's curl is zero.
sentences.chinese: 并且不论在哪里定义，旋度都为零。

sentences.english: But that work was not risk-free.
sentences.chinese: 但是这份工作并非零风险。

sentences.english: Minimal double type number in C after which computer start thinking that its zero.
sentences.chinese: 最小的双型数C后，计算机开始认为它的零。

definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
midnight/to order à la carte/(math.) zero of a function
